ygData.subject: Re: [RE: [RE: [eqbards] How do you play this game?]]
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool! I ll try it out as soon as I can :-) I use the directional arrows on the KB to move around. Mel ...
ygData.messageBody:
Cool! I'll try it out as soon as I can :-) I use the directional arrows on the
KB to move around.

Mel

"Webber, Jessica" <webber@...> wrote:

> > Question........how do you use the keyboard to open doors?
>
> In first person view the U key "uses" things, including doorknobs. I've
> remapped mine to X, since my movement keys are ESF&C.
>
> > Targeting is
> > sometimes a problem for me also.....And is there no way to
> > switch items, like
> > weapons to instruments, with the keyboard? I'd love to never
> > use my mouse!
>
> I wish!! But no.
>
> Peace
> Evulia, bard of 10 verses, Tunare
